A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So good! They took things in exciting new directions. With the requisite fan service out of the way in force awakens\, we are ready to get down to business. Though the casino scene is a bit tedious and Poe's story is heavy handed\, it's more than made up for with the main story with Rey\, Kylo\, Luke\, and the terrifyingly powerful Snoke. And the special effects and sound are stunning. Highly recommend this movie!
